Reviews.Title: “Weekend Break Hotel”
Reviews.Author: haigh119
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend break couple hotel adequate sleep bathrooms huge clean ours shower bedroom dark beds hotel main road didnt hear traffic hotel located monumental metro stop little centre 30 mins walk las ramblas sagrada familia visible hotel nice stroll breakfast lovely views recommend hotel dont mind extra bit walking jumping taxi 6 euros las ramblas return barcelona look hotel central

Reviews.Title: “Weekend Break!”
Reviews.Author: kate006
Reviews.Content: stayed nights weekend break barcelona deal hotelscom hotel central werent disappointed arrived hotel modern boutique feel february clean nice location pretty beside monumental metro stop getting barcelona easy sagrada familia short walk staff friendly helpful walked main day probably 25 minutes im convenient locations main tourist pay lot happy hotel short stay value

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay with a beautiful view”
Reviews.Author: StuLloyd72
Reviews.Content: lot staying hotel real joy main sticks mind view sagrada familia balcony staying 8th floor junior suite paying extra money worth wake morning curtains amazing expression gaudis brilliance hotel amost door monumental metro stop getting barcelona easy reception staff friendly helpful service breakfast morning food tasty eat ideal short stay clean air conditioning heating february perfectly bathroom set shower hotel added perfect holiday beautiful city

Reviews.Title: “Still looking for the 4th star”
Reviews.Author: lleidatana43
Reviews.Content: list positive aspects hotel location convenient choice breakfast buffet breakfast served 1100 weekdays nicely night birds plus girl reception permanently living friendly thats weve stayed hotels barcelona past couple definitely list tiny poorly kept reviewers mentioned hear neighbours bathroom heating whenever left door closed night freezing morning water pressure shower poor despite loud noise feared wake neighbours worst stay cleaning service dust bunnies corners stains bed covers replaced towels suspicious shade grey wouldnt expect fourstar hotel booked romantic package list website included bottle cava couldnt drink morning removed word thats call bad service

Reviews.Title: “I recommend and will come back - just a very few flaws compared to usual standard in Spanish hotels”
Reviews.Author: Lucie81
Reviews.Content: hotel stylish appears pictures cute comfortable bathrooms spacious hotel clean spain standard trust living spain travelling hate system sheet blanket usual southern countries emphasize proper sheets weird blankets bed covers changed minibar fridge kettle tea coffee sugar cream tea cups hotel windows isolate traffic outside isolation hear guests nextdoor breathing eg hear cleaning lady morning walks moves beds change covers especially closing bedrooms doors somehow clients hotel society noise shouting loud bounce doors opposite hotels slept life drama little mention finding weak hotel time hotel invest bit quality fashionable design otherwise loved loved people hard nice quality cushions am wondering sleep soft beds healthy regarding district imminent center center regret eixample belongs city quiter rambla etc 50 metres max metro runs 3 minutes mere 2 stops placa passeig de gracia 5 minutes walking distance sagrada familia convenient concert strongly recommend beer meal czech bar bit sagrada familia 10 minutes walk girls bake homemade bread cook meals treats usually beer pub polish shop close sf offering groceries

Reviews.Title: “Quick stopover in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: hotel fine walls bit thin hear people door fine clean modern location close segrada familia metro road nice eat close evidence security concerns expect pay 30 euro taxi fare airport train time

Reviews.Title: “nice, but noisy”
Reviews.Author: Annikken M Posted by a Finn traveler
Reviews.Content: nicely decorated noisy overlooking streets lots traffic prefer skip aircondition window night bring balkony picture top suite balcony near metro stops center town metro fantastic experience near sagrada de familia fantastic choose hotel time

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel near Metro station and La Sagrada Familia”
Reviews.Author: Orion3377
Reviews.Content: eurostars gaudi located near monumental metro station eixample bit quieter las ramblas metro close block metro quick clean cheap hotel boutique hotel lobby doubles breakfast try desk staff friendly spoke english computer station wifi six floor close elevator bit noisier requested quiet elevator walls thin neighbors easily heard cigarette smoke filtered floors hardwood footsteps heard interrupt sleep busy streets outside windows filtered noise furnishings fine beds bit hard pillows flat bathroom clean updated shower trouble maintaining temperature closet shelves temperature adjusted thermostat ac la sagrada familia short ten minute walk restaurants close hotel pharmacy grocery store restaurantbars monumental bullring barcelona 2012 ride bikes rental rack outside hotel rate internet

Reviews.Title: “A monumental mistake”
Reviews.Author: onionboy
Reviews.Content: firstly city barcelona visited friendly definitely visit city admit massively impressed hotel arrival move faulty shower terrible smell moved type floor caretaker look rude entered told reception smell incorrect cluttered slightest noise corridor night heard ridiculous amount traffic outside night meant little sleep incredibly hot stuffy gripe bath plug wait half hour plug delivered inconvenience receptionist arrival friendly helpful location hotel excellent excellent metro money spent hotel hotel outweighed poor etc trip success due wonderful city special person shared holiday

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, comfortable and well-designed rooms”
Reviews.Author: Katrin_Klein
Reviews.Content: liked realy liked hotel design clean personel nice helpful breakfast fresh various metro station hotel comfortable walk 1015 min sagrada familia disliked booked romantic offer surprised cant double bath unfortunately options twin bath double shower pay double bed bath

Reviews.Title: “Clean, great views but not too large or centralized”
Reviews.Author: travelnut718
Reviews.Content: found deal hotel online clean bed bathroom gorgeous size spectacular view la sagrada familia close trainbus close action barcelona beautiful city walk aimlessly wasnt

Reviews.Title: “Ok but...”
Reviews.Author: chanthird
Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel nights august 2010 arrived hotel 12pm front desk staff friendly question upgrade additional 30 euro night told assigned 1st floor 105 decor nice modern bathroom bad shape bathroom sinks sinks hot water sink continuous drip caused yellow stain sink mirror brown ring entire edge mirror bidet missing nozzle left rusted screw sticking shower worse tile pressured washed replaced shower shoes touch shower floor handheld shower head mount wall stand water hold nozzle 6 round pressure nozzles shower water water couldn’t adjust nozzles entire bathroom wall door wet handheld device hotel close sagrada família 30 minute walk harbor beach stay hotel bathroom didn’t agree upgrade

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel...just one complaint”
Reviews.Author: i_heart_vaykays
Reviews.Content: hotel comfortable beds nice bathroom fantastic staff steps metro close sagrada familia shops cafes etc complaint internet didnt entire time booked hotel free internet guests feature expected mightve picked hotel able internet
